You have just gotten your first pokemon from Profeser Oak's lab. Grass type pokemon were your favorite pokemon and decided to take Bulbasaur as your starter.

Bulbasaur still didn't look too happy. You decided to figure out what's wrong with it and go up to your Bulbasaur. "Hey there Bulbasaur is there something wrong?"

The Bulbasaur looks at you with a sad look. "Bulbasaur" "Is there something bothering you?" Bulbasaur didn't respond this time. You then keep asking it.

"Please tell me what's wrong. I'm your trainer and I want to find out what's wrong" You then try to touch it. But suddenly. Bulbasaur let's out a strange powder and flee's into the woods.

You were then cover in the powder and cough a bit until you got knock out. When you awoke. You find out that everything was bigger now and you felt like something was on your back.

"What happen to me and where did Bulbasaur go?" He remembers that he camp right near a lake and decided to get a drink. But when you did. You were surprise to see you were turn into a Bulbasaur.

"I'm a Bulbasaur! How did this happen to me?" Your Bulbasaur then appear who seem a little happy. "Sorry for that. When you try to touch me I got scared"

"You change me into your own kind?" "Yes but it was an accident. It sometimes happen when we get scared easily" "Bulbasaur now that I can understand what you are saying. Can you tell me why you were sad?"

Bulbasaur sigh. "I guess so. You have the right to know. You see the truth is"

1112.title: Pikachu

11121.content:
"Uhhh... Wh-what...?"

Here you are, an unfortunate being who has forgotten nearly everything about who you were. You remembered nothing more than a blinding light and a soothing voice that gave a name, "Pikachu."

...Well, there was another thing you remembered, and it was that you were a human. You remember that much, but nothing more, about yourself.

As you come to and start to stand, you realize you definitely weren't a human anymore... It's quite obvious, anyway, unless a human has yellow fur, or paws, or a tail...

The tail at this moment gets the most attention from you. You look at it, knowing that its shape tells you your gender...
11121.title: Sure!

111211.content:
Alright, so you're a male. That's a step in the right direction. You look around to see you're deep in a forest, though. Where you were exactly, you didn't know.

You decide to explore the forest a bit. "Might as well, at least. It's better than sitting around doing nothing," you think aloud.

You start to trot through the large, winding forest, but your search isn't really going anywhere. If you had known this place, you might actually know where you're going, but every time you move to a different section of the forest, it all seems the same. Just a ton of trees.

You continue searching, though. If there's perhaps another of your kind around, you want to find it.

After about an hour of searching, though, you start to feel weak and have to rest. You sit, leaning against one of the trees, and close your eyes, passing out from exhaustion.

Hours later, you wake up. It's evening, it seems. As you look around, you realize...

“Well, depending on if you were my trainer. 111211211212.title: He was bitten by a Pokémon.

1112112112121.content:
“Well I don’t want to be a shell; but I also don’t want to go this fast can we at least wait a while, before we mate?” “Yeah I guess this is kind of quick, I’m sorry Damon.” “I understand you’re reasons for the idea. I just am not that ready yet: I promise that when I am ready I will mate you.”

“I will hold you to that promise, Damon you know that right?” “Yeah I do Sarah.” “I’m glad that you remember my name at the least.” “I mean you were my Pokémon why would I not remember your name?” “Well… after you died I was afraid you might forget me. Thinking you were going into the after world.” “Well, that does make sense; but I was apparently reborn a Pokémon with my memories.”

“Do you happen to think Arceus did this?” “Is it powerful enough to do that?” “Well… It cares deeply for its Pokémon; I wish I could contact it.” Suddenly there is a flash of light just outside the cave. You both rush out what you see is beyond relief, standing just outside the cave is none other than Arceus itself. “Did I call it somehow?” “Yes, you have; I am able to hear everything and anything about my creations.”

Sarah walks up to Arceus and speaks very shyly, “Umm… Arceus did you transform my trainer into a Pokémon to repair my heart?” “Yes, even though I had mesprit create all the emotions, she was told you create the bad ones also. Sorrow, Sadness, Loneliness, Depression; none of which she wanted to create; but what would happen if there was no sorrow for lost ones?” “I see your point.”

“But even though I shouldn’t have done it I saw into his heart he was pure, if he wasn’t I wouldn’t have been able to do that.” “I had always been kind and considering of my Pokémon.” “I had used a lot of my power to transform you. And teleporting from the Hall of Origins.” “Do you need to rest?” “That would be nice; and Damon I know what she has asked you, what she is asking for is not something to be taken lightly. For the process of mating it allows female to get a closer connection to their partner.”

“I never said I wouldn’t; I just wasn’t comfortable with it right now.” “You do know that I could take you away though.” *GULP* “But wouldn’t that just make Sarah’s heart have an empty hole and become a hollow shell.” “Yes, if you break your promise to her then I might have no choice, but to do it.” “I understand you’re ummm… Lord?” “No needs for the formal addressing just call me Arceus.” “Thank you for your insight Arceus.” “You’re welcome my new creation.”

“Would you like to stay for dinner?” “That would be just long enough, for me to regain some of my power to return to the Hall of Origins. Also take this so you may contact me or I may transport to you easier. It takes a lot of my power to locate someone without a flute.” “Ummm… If I am correct this is called The Heaven’s Flute?” “Yes you are very well informed of what this is and does.”

“It not only allows the user to contact Arceus, It also allows them to go to Arceus in The Hall of Origins.” “That is correct; I have made a good choice then. Most people have looked for the flute for eons, many have failed. Simply because I was looking for a mortal pure of heart and worthy of using my power’s correctly. I had searched far and wide and then I came upon you… But I saw you got bitten by that wild Pokémon. Suffering what was called Neo-Pokerus.” “What is that exactly I have never heard of it?”

“It is a rare, but extremely dangerous disease and human bitten by it is doomed to die within 48 hours. I saw this and thought, No my chosen Pure of Heart; I chose then and there is one way to save this human, to turn him into a Pokémon. I did have the burial ceremony go like normal, and then transformed him with his memories, feelings, and then I reunited him with his closest Pokémon.” “Wow, you went through all that trouble?” “It wasn’t easy I assure you that, it took up almost all of my energy then I had to find you.”

“To explain right?” “Correct again; you are a smart person; I made a good choice when choosing you. Also if you want me to can change you back into a human and have Dialga and Palkia, to modify some things.” “Umm… Wouldn’t that use up almost the rest of you powers?” “Well, yeah but you could begin your journey again as if you hadn’t been bitten.” “Ummm… No thanks I want to stay like this; but I like this form even though I was human before.”

“If that it all I would like for you both to come to The Hall of Origins with me for a bit.” “Can you take all of us without using too much power?” “One second.” He makes a loud roar and the three of you are standing outside the cave. “One more second.” He then does an even louder roar. Almost instantly a rip of pink appears to his left. And a blue portal his right. You both stand in awe as Dialga and Palkia emerge into their area. “Lord Arceus, did these two hurt you?” They charge attacks.

“No don’t!” There attacks die down. “They did not hurt me I just have a lack of energy.” “How are you having a lack of energy?” “You see this Pikachu was heartbroken. And you know how I was looking for that Pure of Heart human.” “Yeah did you find him?” “Where is he then?” “You know that Neo-Pokerus I thought I got rid of.” “Yeah?” “Apparently I missed one and it bit the human.” “No! The 48 hours death?” “Yes, I had but one choice I changed the human into a Pokémon after his burial.” “So, is it one of the Pikachu’s?” “Yes, the male one. Now can you loan me some energy so I can take them to The Hall of Origins?”

“Of course our Lord.” The two Pokémon then gather a bunch of energy in orbs before sending it into Arceus. Arceus finally stands up in full strength then almost immediately there was a huge flash and then they were in a huge marble building. “Where are we?” “This is my domain the Hall of Origins.” “It is so massive did you make this?” “Sort of I used most of my power to create a hidden place for me to rest.” “I bet it took forever to do this.” “Yes, but I did allow the other legendaries to help me create it.”

“So after it was created you took to a long rest before looking for a pure of heart to use your powers for good.” “That is correct Damon.” “I’m sorry I wasn’t paying attention, I never knew you had chosen me. I heard legends of Arceus creator of Pokémon looking far and wide for a pure of heart.” “Yes, the legends are true I looked far and wide. When I found you I saw you been bitten and I had to intervene or you would be lost and there would be no other pure of heart.”

“I… Didn’t think that I would have been chosen, as your human.” “I can understand people have looked far and wide for me, but I am hidden somewhere no regular person can find.” “But didn’t team plasma try and find you?” “Yes, but as I had said no one, but the purest of heart could find me.” “I do wish that I could have saved you from the fate you had been forced to receive.”

“Well, Sarah I guess I am ready to mate you. Arceus would you send us back to our cave?” “Of course my chosen champion.” And in yet another flash you were both back in the cave. “Well, let’s go get this over with.”

You attended classes at the college down the road from your apartment. For several weeks you have been running home after school to avoid an ass-kicking. You had no pokemon and no way to defend yourself, leaving you with only the option of running.

On this particular night you were sprinting down the street hoping someone would help, when two thugs stepped out in front of you halting your progress. You skid to a stop and try to slip past them, but they grab your arms and hold you still, despite your struggling.

"Good job boys, now lets show this punk-ass bitch why you don't cross our territory." He stepped up and threw a punch into your gut, lifting you off your feet and driving the air from your lungs.

"Why? I didn't do anything to them" you think as the blows pummel your body "They can do this because they're stronger than you." a voice, like your own but more sinister, rang inside your head. "I can give you the strength to make them stop, would you like that?" "Who are you?" "Hahaha, Me? I'm nobody important but you, you could be veey important. It all depends on your answer. Do you want the strength? Be warned, it will change you in ways you'll never imagine. Would you like the pain to stop?"

"I-gahh" your mind flashes with pain as your head hits a brick wall. "I want the power" You mutter quietly. "Good" the voice fades and is replaced by a dark power unlike anything you've ever felt.

The gang murmurs quietly as they see your body begin to convulse as it changes to accommodate the new power.

Your teeth stretch and sharpen, your bones shift and change, your hair turns stark-white. The thugs step back as you finish your change. You lean over a puddle to see your new face. Red eyes, black fur and a long black horn. "Absol, I'm an Absol" You whisper.

"Boss he's some kinda freak, what do we do?" "I don't care if he's your Mom! Kick its ass!" The thug cautiously approached you, hands raised as if for boxing. You smile slightly as he pulls back for a punch. You catch his fist as it swings forward, twist it to the side and kick him in the stomach.

"Heh...heheh...hahah...AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA" you throw your head back laughing like a maniac "You" you point at the leader with your new hand "are gonna pay"
131211.title: Story1

1312111.content:
"Fuck you, freak!" The leader pulls a switchblade from his back pocket. He rushed forward thrusting the knife at your gut. You grab his wrist and spin as fast as you can. The guy gets pulled off his feet as you turn, nearly breaking his arm. As you reach a full turn you release him, sending him flying into his buddies. The thugs scattered as their leader crashes into them.

"I'm outta here!" The boss starts to run following his lackeys. Before he got to the end of the alley you grabbed his shoulder and spun him around. You plant your foot in his face lifting him into the air. As his flight reaches its apex, you grab an ankle and slam him into the ground. He groans holding his chest. "He's probably got some broken ribs, I could just leave him here, that's what he would've done, but I'm not him.
1312111.title: He attacks you

13121111.content:
You groan and rub you forehead. You might not be human anymore, but you still have morals. "I'm so gonna regret this." you sling the brute over your shoulder with little effort. "What are you doing?" The voice in yiur head sounds shocked "He tried to kill you, and you're going to help him?" "That was the plan" you start to move towards the street but stop. "If I go out there people will freak, I don't want that" you flex your new hands and feel your claws bite into your palms. "Maybe if I..." You dig your claws into the stonework on the side of the building, hoisting yourself up the wall.

At the top of the building you get your bearings and run in the direction of the hospital. You leap from roof to roof, reveling in your new agility. You quickly arrive at the hospital and drop your cargo off at the ambulance entrance, before returning to the rooftops.
13121111.title: Take him to a hospital

131211112.content:
You stifle a yawn as you leap over the alleyway. "Damn I'm tired" you hang your legs over the edge and think for a moment. "I can't go home I'd never get inside without being seen, I guess I'll just sleep in the park"

You get back onto the roof and leap to the next building. "Hey voice, you still there?" "How can I help you?" it responds "So am I like half pokemon now?" "More or less" You continue running over the rooftops while you speak. "So can I use moves?" "Yes" "Kick ass" you leap off a tall building and drop into an alley.

Across the street you can see the gate to the park. You climb partway up the building and leap out onto a street lamp. You swing around the pole and launch yourself over the gate, hoping nobody saw you. "Alright" you climb into a tree and find a comfortable spot before falling asleep.
131211112.title: Run around more

1312111121.content:
You yawn and stretch out your arms and legs as the light of a new day reaches through the trees.

You shifted slightly as you thought about your situation. "I'm half Absol now, I can apparently use moves, and I can't go home" your thoughts were interrupted by a pair of voices under the tree.

You tried to see who they were but a snap from one of the branches sent you crashing to the ground. You staggered to your feet, ears ringing as you held the side of your head. A light brown and cream-colored figure entered your field of vision. As it got closer your instincts kicked in and you tried to dash away in the other direction. You didn't get far before you lost your equilibrium and collapsed.

A hand touched your shoulder making you twist and swing your claws at it. "Get away from me" "Calm down, you're hurt" a soft, soothing voice came from your left followed by a more abrasive one from from your right "If you don't stop screwing around you're just gonna get yourself hurt more" You growl and stumble away from the voices, unable to keep your balance.

"Alright that's enough!" the more abrasive voice was suddenly directly behind you. It grabbed your head and smacked you into the ground. With a groan you try to get back up but an impact to the back of your head sends you spiraling into unconsciousnes.
1312111121.title: morning

13121111211.content:
Your head throbs and forces you awake, gasping in pain. "Are you ok?" a worried voice drew your attention "I had to hit you pretty hard" the owner of the voice was revealed to be a female Zangoose.

"O-ow" you groan as you feel the lump on the back of your head. "Where am I?" "My home, after I knocked you out I didn't think it would be wise to just leave you there. After all you're not quite..." she paused for a moment searching for a word. "Normal" you interjected

"Yeah normal. So if you don't mind me asking, what exactly are you?" "Well I have reason to believe I'm half human-half Absol" "W-what?" she scratched her head. "How can you be?"

you take that moment to look around and get an idea of your surroundings. You were laying in a nest of sorts, in a rather plain room with a single hole in the wall for a window.

"Were you born like this?" "No I used to be human. It was just the other day. I was getting beaten up, I heard a voice in my head and then I kinda, transformed and beat the crap out of a few of them"

You could tell she was about to ask another question when someone started banging on the door "Lindsey! Lindsey! Open up!" The Zangoose apparently named Lindsey opened the door revealing a...
13121111211.title: Later

131211112111.content:
Lindsey pulled open the door revealing a Lopunny. "Hey has that guy woken up yet?" "Yeah Kara he's over there"

Kara stepped into the room, eagerly hopping to the bedside. "Wow, I still can't get over how strange you look" you give her a withering glare "Thank you" you say sarcastically. "Sorry, but you're just so unlike anything I've ever seen. Just what are you?" "I'm half human and half Absol"

Your toe-claws click together as you stretch your legs and attempt to get out of the bed. "Thanks for bringing me here, but I should get out of your fur" you wobble slightly as you walk to the door. Lindsey helps you keep your balance as you step unsteadily forward. As you step into the sunlight your inner voice decides to speak.

"Find an isolated location, you need to learn how to wield your new power" You were about to set off when Kara jumped in front of you. "Where are you going?" "Elsewhere" you say casually as you step around her. "Mind if I join you?" "Kinda"

You raise your nose into the air and inhale deeply. You detect hints of other pokemon, plants, and exhaust fumes. "Still in the park" you mumble to yourself. You take a step forward and begin to jog, accelerating into a run and finally dropping onto all fours at full speed.

Kara stood watching for a moment before calling out to Lindsey. "I'm going after him, I don't think he's going to be okay" "I agree, he's going to get hurt for real" The two of them begin following slowly while you tear through the park at breakneck speed. You reach the edge of the park and leap over the fence, landing in a dark alley. "I should head into the forest outside the city, nobody goes out there"
131211112111.title: Lopunny

1312111121111.content:
You slink through the alleyways, keeping out peoples sight. Before long you reach the edge of the trees and pick up your pace, searching for a secluded area.

You stop in a heavily forested area with large stone outcroppings. "This looks good. Alright voice what now?" "Now sit with your legs crossed, hands placed flat against each other and concentrate" you do as the voice asks and sit on a boulder in the position described.

"Right now I have sealed your dark energy so you don't accidentally destroy something. Before I let you take control however, I will have to take physical form so I can properly teach you" before you can respond an odd sensation envelops your body and energy rushes out of you. You slump forward breathing heavily. "You handled that rather well" A voice said from in front of you. "Most pass out or vomit" you look up to see a being very much like you.

"What?" "I am the source of your powers, the reason you transformed, and the only being in existence that can teach you to control your power" you take a closer look at him. He was a bipedal Absol like you, but where you were normal(relatively speaking) he was a shiny, with red skin and blue eyes.

"Let's get started" he pulled you to your feet and placed a hand on your stomach. There was a sharp pain for a second followed by a small surge of dark energy.

"The power floods your body and mind threatening to consume you. "If you can't control it, it will control you" Voice added as he watched you. "You have to subdue it in your head before you can fight with it"

Your mental struggle drags on for what feels like hours, wearing down at your resolve. "You'll have to do better than that" Voice taunted "I thought you could do this but maybe your weaker than I thought" you grit your teeth at his words. They were the reason you were doing this, those three little words: you are weak.

With that thought in mind you strike back at the dark power flooding your body, grabbing it squeezing it and forcing it into submission.

"Congratulations, you have begun training" Voice stood over you as you panted from the mental stress. Both of you completely unaware of the two watching you. "There's two of him?!"Kara gasps as she takes her first look at the scene "No I don't think so" Lindsey responds. "Maybe they're family?" "I don't know. for now lets just keep an eye on them"
1312111121111.title: Finding an area

13121111211111.content:
"You have successfully gained a slight amount of your energies" Voice said as he helped you to your feet. "Now you have to learn to control them" he pointed towards a boulder. "Try focusing all your energy in your fist and hit that rock"

You were still breathing hard so you waited for a moment before closing your eyes and reaching for the dark energy. You see it in your mindscape, a dark swirling vortex of energy. It surged violently as you tried to grab it, still resisting you. "You're mine!" you grab the darkness and force it into your fist "RAAUUUGH! you charge forward, your fist exuding a black aura. You pull back readying a powerful swing when the power slips from your grasp, retreating back into your mind. Your fist connects with the boulder sending pain shooting up your arm.

"Oooh so close" Voice chuckled as you shook your hand. "You need to get a better grip on it" "It's not easy, it's fighting me every step of the way" You growl rubbing your hurt fist. "Hmm I was afraid of that, the energy is at odds with your mind. This energy reacts differently to everyone and it isn't accustomed to the new vessel, you" "So what should I do?" "There's only one thing to do, practice" he grinned as you grimace.

"Fine, let's continue" you reach out to the energy once again, feeling it resist just like last time. This time instead of forcing it, you attempt to gently guide it into your fist. To your surprise it goes along with you and your fist blazes with nearly all of your dark energy. "Be careful not to use all your energy in one attack. In battle, that could kill you" you nod and try to get some of the energy to recede, only to find that it wouldn't go back. "Fortunately for you, were not in battle so if it still won't obey you could just use it. Try hitting that rock"

Your fist hits the rock but nothing happens, your hand is still glowing and the rock still exists. You look at Voice exasperated. "Uhh, I got nothin" he shrugs. You punch the boulder again, this time creating a large explosion that throws you back into another boulder.

"Ouch" Lindsey inhales sharply as you collide with the rock, while Kara nearly collapses laughing. "T-this is great!" she giggles as she watches Voice poke your prone body. "But he is pretty cute"
13121111211111.title: Training

choices: "I thought you'd get hurt if left alone"
131211112111111.content:
You slowly awake to a throbbing fist and a slight headache. "Good morning sleeping beauty!" Voice said loudly "That last attempt knocked you out cold" You grumble and shove yourself to your feet.

You wobble for a moment before finding your balance. Your joints pop and crack as you stretch your arms, loosening in their sockets. A yawn escaped your mouth and you listened as Voice began to speak. "You should probably start warming up, we have a lot of work to do"

Kara was leaning against a rock, tapping her foot impatiently. "Why don't we just go over there?" "Because" Lindsey sighed "What they're doing seems to be important, I don't think we should interrupt" "Whatever, I'm going over there" Kara leapt over the Zangoose and hopped over to your clearing.

You were standing perfectly still, focusing intently on the darkness inside you. It swirled viciously as you coaxed it into your hands. You clenched a fist creating an eerie black aura around it. You leapt forward throwing a punch at the boulder. Mere moments from impact a voice exclaimed "So this is what you were talking about" breaking your concentration, causing the energy to fade.

As you look to see who it was your now normal fist collides with the boulder, sending bolts of pain up your arm.

"What do you want?" you growl as you rub your hurt hand.
131211112111111.title: Interuptions

1312111121111111.content:
"Curious? Really, that's why you followed me all the way out here?" You flex your hand as you glare at the Lopunny "Ever heard the expression: Curiosity killed the cat?" She huffed and put her paws on her hips "I'm not a cat"

"Well, you've seen what I'm doing. Haven't you satisfied your curiosity?" You turn your back on her preparing for another attempt. "Not really" she steps towards you "I still wanna know about you" you twitch as she gets closer. "What are you? How did you get this way? I've still got a lot of questions"

You turn slightly so you could see her with one red eye. "Are you sure you want the answers?" she falters, but only for a moment. "Yes" "Well I don't have the fucking answers. Two days ago I was a human, then I get assaulted in an alleyway and become half human half pokemon" you grind your teeth "Now please! Leave the freak in peace!" your voice echoes loudly as the reality of your situation hits you. You will always be alone, forever an outcast.
1312111121111111.title: "I was curious"

13121111211111111.content:
The pitch black energy engulfs your hand once more and you drive your fist into the boulder. A massive shockwave knocks Voice and Kara off their feet, and reduces the rock to rubble.

You press a hand to your head as it throbs in sync with your heartbeat. You roar in rage and anguish as you mourn the death of your old life.

"I've lost everything" you say sadly "I can't go back" you glance over at Kara as she rises to her feet. "If you're here I'm sure your friend can't be far" She stiffens slightly as you speak, and you know you're right. "Why don't you go get her"
13121111211111111.title: continue

131211112111111111.content:
"Get her and get out of here, I've got work to do" you attempt to draw out more of the power but you find that there is little left. You frown and see that Kara has gone "good" you think to yourself "I doubt she's gone for good" Voice yawns and stretches. "She's exactly the type to not listen" "Whatever she's not important right now" you dredge up the last of your power and swing at another boulder

"What happened!?" "He just lost control for a second" Kara explained "I think he's lost everything" "what's going to happen?" Lindsey worried aloud "I don't know, but I don't think he's an actual threat. He just seems sad"

"Alright alright, cut it out before you hurt yourself" Voice intervened as you were about to strike the boulder again. "You're out of the dark energy. You'll just have to wait for it to build up again" you drop to a sitting position panting hard. "What am I even training for? Other than not accidentally killing everything." "Well I guess I should start with this
131211112111111111.title: continue

1312111121111111111.content:
“You’re not the only hybrid” Voice explains casually “There are plenty more. I don’t know how many or where they are but you definitely aren’t the only one, you’re not even the first” he leans back against a rock, “I’m sure you’ll meet some of them eventually but in the meantime you have to focus on getting stronger and increasing your reserves of dark energy. We don’t know how the others will react to you so it’s best to be prepared” you sit quietly as you digest this new information.

“You think they might attack me?” “I dunno, it’s possible” he shrugs “Alright, how’s your energy level?” you feel for it only to find that it was almost as much as when you started. “It’s almost fully recharged” “Well, your recovery level is normal” He hops down from his spot and spreads his arms wide. “Hit me. Full strength” “Why?” “I want to see how well you control the energy. You’re not gonna hurt me” “Alright you asked for it” you guide the energy into your fist one more time, pulling out all the stops, forcing every last bit of power into your hand.

Nearly your entire arm was coated with an inky black light. “Still sure it won’t hurt?” Voice merely gestured for you to strike. You lunge forward leaning almost horizontal to the ground, with the charged fist held close to your chest. The claws on your hind paws dig into the ground, and you twist your torso hard. The darkness around your arm surges up towards your fist as it collides with Voices’ stomach.

There was a deep pulse of sound that rattled your teeth and the darkness exploded, launching Voice airborne. Unconsciously you step forward again and throw another punch. Your second strike never landed. In midair Voice was able to catch your fist and spin, throwing you to the ground. “If that’s the best you’ve got, you won’t stand a chance against another hybrid” he steps on your back holding you down.

He lifts his paw only to place it on the back of your head. His weight forces your face into the dirt. “Get off me” you growl through the soil. “Who’s gonna make me? You? You can’t beat me, even with all this power you’re still weak”
Voice rambled on “I bet your family is worried, you traded your life for power. To them you simply vanished, and how do you think they feel right now? They’re probably going through hell, it’s your fault and it was all for nothing, YOU ARE MAKING THEM SUFFER FOR NO REASON!” he pressed your head further into the dirt and leaned forward so he was speaking directly in your ear. “Maybe I should put them out of their misery?” “Bastard! Leave them alone” you growl “This doesn’t involve them” “No, but it will” Voice laughed maniacally. He lifted his foot for a moment before stomping on your head with a great deal of strength.

You see stars and taste blood, but you still try to get to your feet. A kick to your midsection drives all the air from your lungs, forcing you to collapse once more. Voice rolled you over onto your back. “You were a mistake” he raises one hand and points at you with an index finger. A sphere of pure darkness begins to coalesce at the tip of his red claw. “This’ll be enough to kill you. Goodbye” Voices eyes lit up for a moment and he immediately leapt backwards, deftly avoiding a massive Jump Kick from Kara.

Shaking out the leg she landed on Kara called out defiantly “He’s the most interesting thing to happen in ages, so I can’t just let him die” “I told you to get lost” you lift yourself up onto your knees, clutching your chest. “When did I start taking orders from you?” she responded cheekily.

“You owe me, big time” She leapt into the air and slammed both feet into the ground where Voice had been a moment ago. Following up on her Bounce with a Dizzy Punch, Kara managed to force Voice onto the defense.

A quick Slash made her back off, giving Voice some room to breathe. You watch the battle unfold and consider your situation, you could…
1312111121111111111.title: You aren't the only hybrid

13121111211111111111.content:
‘I'm not gonna run’ you think to yourself, ‘I wouldn't get far anyways’ your thoughts turn to voice and his sudden change in personality.

“At first it seemed he wanted to help me get strong. But all of a sudden he became a psycho, it’s almost as if” your eyes widen in realization, “son of a bitch! I’m an Idiot!” you focus on the feelings that had risen up while voice was beating you. The rage, the hate, and the fear for your family. As you did this Voice suddenly stopped fighting and began to stare at you.

With the negative emotions filling your heart, you could feel the dark energy surge up and begin to overflow. Your entire body took on an oily black glow, and your injuries disappeared. Rising to your feet you clench your fists. Your eyes formerly a sinister red, were now glowing crimson with power and focused squarely on Voice. Kara couldn’t help but to shiver as she observed your surge of power, ‘That power feels, wrong’

In an instant you closed the distance between you and Voice. The shock had barely registered in his eyes when your fist collided with his face. Much like last time there was a loud bang, but this time Voice wouldn’t be retaliating so easily, you could feel it.

He was launched backwards and slammed into a tree putting a large crack in the trunk. As he slumped to the ground you closed in on him once more. You swing a wide kick with your left leg that connects horizontally across his stomach. The force of your kick slams him into and through the damaged tree.

As he lands you can clearly see blood come out of his mouth. “Well? Am I still too weak?” you grab him by his horn and toss him back into the clearing.

“I figured it out, you were never going to kill my family. You were pretending to betray me to bring out my rage. This dark power responds to negative emotions like hate and anger, doesn’t it?”

“Not as dumb as you look” Voice manages to cough out before fainting.

“What the fuck was that?” Kara asks, still unsettled by your power. “Not really sure, but it’s really strong” you let the emotions fade away and with them your power returns to almost normal levels. Almost immediately your head throbs and you’re hit by vertigo. You fall to the ground holding your head, and curl up into the fetal position. “Hey! Are you alright?”

You don’t respond, or even hear her, you are too enveloped by the pain. Gently, she lifts you up and carries you over her shoulder. “Damn you’re heavy”

Where does she take you?

As your mind is slowly becoming fuzzy your thoughts are mixed between wanting this Gallade as a lover and not wanting him and staying in your male self. "Why are you doing this to me?" "It's simple human I want a mate, and want to make you my mate."

As your human parts start to disappear to be replaced by Pokémon parts your body becoming white and your arm green as your chest starts to inflate as breast make their appearance on your chest as you lower region starts to change as your dick and balls change into a female part. Your very own vagina.

As your body finishes the changing into a Gardevoir. Your mind becomes fuzzy again as he starts to remove all the memories of you ever being human. After a while he succeeds in converting your mind to believing you are a female Gardevoir.

You reply “Sam are you ok?” “Of course I am ok I was worried when you hadn’t come back after you went to pick the garden when I came out I found you surrounded by Mightyena’s.” “Oh Sam I am glad you are so brave if you hadn’t come I don’t know what would have happened.”

“Let’s go back inside the house ok sweetie?” “Of course Sam let’s go inside.” You both head inside as your making dinner there’s a knock on the door you ask Sam to get it he says “Sure honey.” As he opens the door you see another Gallade standing in the door.

He says “Honey I’ll be back in a second.” “Ok Sam don’t take too long.” “But of course sweetie.” As you go back to cooking you soon finish and make a plate for yourself and for him. He comes in looking like he had been in a fight. You run over to him and ask what happened.

He then says “An old rival of mine jealous and wanting to take you from me. But I took good care of him.” You both sit down and enjoy dinner afterwards you go to clean up, but stopped you. He said “Allow me to clean up since you made dinner it should only be fair that I clean up.”
1312311111121111.title: A mate for Gallade!

13123111111211111.content:
As you head towards your guys room to get ready for bed. While Sam is in the kitchen you are soon happy you found a nice person such as him. You then get ready for bed by undressing and dressing back up in your long bedtime dress.

In the kitchen… As Sam finishes cleaning up the kitchen he calls up to you and asks you to come down. You reply “Coming Sam” as you slowly come down the stairs he then is on the couch with a bowl of popcorn and a movie on the DVD player.

He asks you to sit down and watch it with him you see it’s a bit of a scary movie you reply “Ummm… is it a horror film?” “Mild horror, don’t worry I will be with you right here in case you get scared.” “I guess so…”

And you then sit down beside him while you guys watch the movie. Every now and then something scary would happen and you would cling on to Sam. He hugs you closely to you when anything scary happens. He then see’s that it is scaring you too much he then stops it and says “Ok let’s go to bed okay?”

You then slowly get up and walk up the stairs with him as you lay down he then gets dressed in his clothes. You both lie down and give each other a long passionate kiss. As he says “Good night, Sierra.” “Good night, Sam.” And you guys slowly drift to sleep.

131231111112111111.content:
As you are the first one to wake up in the morning you decide to take a shower as you get your stuff ready you head downstairs towards the bathroom while it would be better if there was one upstairs. As you finish your shower you then get dressed.

As you start to make breakfast you are grabbed from behind as you jump and realize that it’s Sam messing with you like always he knew that you were easily scared and ticklish. He says “Good morning, Sierra.” “Good morning Sam you know I’m easily scared.”

“Yeah I know but it’s not me being mean it’s a little thing in the morning besides I would have caught you if you fell.” “Yeah, but I don’t think it’s very nice to scare someone like that…” “Ok sweetie I’ll stop scaring you in the morning but you know I could tweak your mind so you’re not scared easily.”

“I have told you Sam I don’t appreciate you messing with my thoughts. Remember what happened last time…” “Meh a slight problem, but I fixed it didn’t I?” “True, but you shouldn’t have messed with my thoughts in the first place; there are things I keep to myself.”

“I know that why you’re not very opened up I can understand me scaring you all the time…” After a while you go sit down on the couch and think “Is it really true he doesn’t mean to scare me? Is this relationship working out? And how is he so open minded?”

He comes over with a plate of eggs, bacon, sausage, and biscuits. He hands you one and then goes and puts everything up you then ask “Why are you not eating sweetie?” “Meh not that hungry this morning.” “Oh ok Sam hope you have a wonderful day…” “You too my sweetie.”

13123111121.content:
You wake up in a field where you look down to see large E-cup breasts. You slowly stand up suddenly you can feel the pokemon around you. *I guess I can sense others.* You walk around a bit before a pack of mightyena attack saying "What are you doing in our field?"

They all attack you causing you great pain you fall to your knees thinking *Someone help me!* you see out of your blurry vision a large pokemon and some other thing with it before passing out. *I hope they are friendly.* You soon wake up faintly to hear "Don't worry you'll be fine I promise!" "Voir?" Realizing that the voice was male.

*Where is he taking me? To the pokécenter I hope my body aches so badly!* "Were almost there!" You look to see a red building. *The pokécenter.* Before laying back to rest. "Nurse Joy Come Quick!" "Oh, what is it?" She see's your badly injured body. "What happened?" "She was attacked by a pack of wild mightyenas!" "Bring her to the back."
13123111121.title: Random choice by Arceus

131231111211.content:
In the back she looks you over as you groan in pain “Voir.” “She is in a horrible state lucky you helped her or she could have died.” “Guess it was lucky I showed up.” “Voir.” “She may have to stay a couple days, do you want to stay and watch over her? She may want to come with you for helping her.” “Yes, I helped her I want to see her recover.” “I’ll give you a room for the days she is recovering.” “Thanks Nurse Joy.”

As they leave the room *Thank you trainer, I can never repay your for what you did for me.* Nurse Joy comes in and runs some tests. “You’re going to make a full recovery. That trainer was really worried about you.” “Voir?” “Yes, he wants to stay until you recover he care about you so much.” “Voir…” “He is upstairs tomorrow you may go see him for a bit. “Voir.” You slowly nod before you fall asleep to a warm feeling. *Is it the table healing me that is making me feel warm is this healing me?*

You soon open your eyes to realize that it is dark out… *How long was I out? I still hurt but not as much as before.* You slowly sit up where you see Nurse Joy still running some tests. “Oh you’re awake, did you want to go see Jaden?” You think then slowly nod. *So his name is Jaden… I must find a way to thank him… Not sure how though…” You are told the second door on the left. “Voir.” You walk in to see him sitting on his bed. You walk up to him and tap his shoulder.

He looks up and see’s you… “You feel any better?” “Yes…” “I thought you might speak to me telepathic but not clearly…” “Is… It… Bad?” “No I thought that since you were badly hurt you might not be able to use your powers efficiently, but it is ok… is there anything you want to talk about?” “How… I… Repay… You?” “Huh, oh it was no problem. I just decided to help in that moment.” “May… I… Be… You’re… Pokémon?” “Of course, it is alright with me... I expected something like that.” You reach forward and hug him. “Thank… You… I… Must… Rest…” “I’ll help you down there.” “Thank… you…”

As you lay in his arms you feel like you are growing closer and closer to him… “We’re here.” You are laid down on the bed for rest. “Thank… You… Jaden…” “How did you know my name?” “Nurse… Joy…” “I will check on you tomorrow.” “Good… Night. Jaden…” You soon drift off to a peaceful slumber. *I am so lucky to have met someone as nice as Jaden.* You soon wake up to the sun in your eyes. *Ugh I feel much better today.*

You get up and find your almost fully recovered *One more day and I think I am safe to leave with Jaden…* “Good morning Sunshine!” You look to see Jaden walking into the door. You run over and hug him again. “I missed you.” “You’re very clingy I’m guessing?” “I lived by myself in the woods for 3 years.” “I see you must have been very lonely.” You simply nod “I had no friends and was always on the move when I was in that field.”

“I feel so sorry for you being all alone with no one and always on the move… I will always take care of you.” Your eyes tear up from happiness. You squeeze him saying “Thank you Jaden I will always do my best for you.” “I am glad you’re feeling better though Nurse Joy said one more day.” “I thought I needed about that…”
131231111211.title: Continued

1312311112112.content:
The last day of you being in the Pokemon Center has finally arrived "It feels good to be healthy again... You meant it when you said you would care for me always?" "Of course I don't make promises in thin air." "Thank you Jaden so much I still feel like i haven't repaid you fully." "I told you don't worry about repaying me... I can't think of anything you could do to repay me but if you do it would be nice I am sure." You can't help but smile at this happy moment he has made for you.

*This is not the end I will find some way to pay you back for what you have done for me i must find someway to pay you back.* You guys soon arrive in the next town where the gym type happens to be a fighting type gym weak to Psychic and Flying type knowing your a Psychic type deciding to repay him by fighting this entire gym by yourself if you have to... *I will do my hardest here.*

You both head to the Pokemon Center to get a room you both had decided to rest for the night before facing the gym you a Psychic type had the advantage but what if his pokemon knew counters to their weakness... *I will win this badge for Jaden I don't care how much of my energy it takes!*
1312311112112.title: Skip to tommorow

13123111121122.content:
You all had booked a room at the Pokemon Center. You guys decide to head out for the gym in the morning after you guys had made battle preparations. You all had time to relax as you snuggle close to Jaden. "You feeling clingy. I undrstand that you lived alone and always on the move but this is a little close." "Please, Jaden I just want to be close to you..." Giving him some sad eyes that as he looks into he sees your pain from the past.

"Wow, you have been through a lot..." "How do you know this exactly?" "I can see into pokemon memories..." "Does anyone else know this?" "No and I would prefere it to stay that way." "I can keep that a secret Jaden, but I must be able to be close to when I feel so." "Deal I don't want anyone questioning me about it." "I promise Jaden." And you both lay down for a rest.

In the morning you are still asleep as Jaden slips away to take a shower. "Jaden..." Reaching for him but not finding him you wake up. "Where is Jaden?" You hear water running and a slight humming that sounds fimiliar. "Oh, he is taking a what is it the humans call it? I can't remember as I have never had a trainer before... I have heard people talking." He walks out fully dressed and hair fluffed like you had seen yesterday. "Oh your up! Well good morning." "Good morning Jaden."

You all got some supplies as you all head into the gym... *I will prove myself to him here!* The gym leader stand on a field. "Welcome Trainer this is the Fighting gym you are here to challenge me right?" "Yes, Sir." "Then let's begin are you going to start off with Gardevoir who is not that bad..." You blush a scarlet hue. "Voir..." Jaden turns to you. "You want to go first?" You nod and rush forward. he summons a Machoke... "Machoke!" You ready yourself.

"Trainer get's first move..." "Ok Gardevoir use Pyschic." Your eyes glow green as the Machoke is enveloped in a green Aura where you lift him before ramming him into the ground several times. "Machoke... Use Seismic Toss." "Gardevoir... Teleport!" "Voir." just before he grabs you, you teleport just behind him. "Now Mirrow Move." You grab him before launching into the air and slamming him into the ground.

The dust clears to show Machoke had fainted. "Machoke is Unable to battle. Gardevoir wins." "Gardevoir can you go on?" You think and nod. "Ok. I believe in you..." The next Pokemon he summons is a Makuhita. "Use Giga Impact!" "Use Protect." The attack bounces off. "Mirror Coat." You summon a barrier to reflect 1/4 damage of special moves damage. "Brick Break!" "That will undo my Mirror Coat." You teleport but before you do the Barrier breaks. "I was too slow." You suddenly decide to use your hidden Power.

Your whole body glows as does the opponent's... the body of his start to glitch somewhat like it is fading. "What move is that?" "Mirage Away." The pokemon then faints as it become solid again. "Makuhita is unable to battle that means the winner is Jaden." You run over to Jaden and hug him before fainting in his arms from exhaustion. Next thing you know you wake up on a bed which you recognize as the bed at the pokemon center. "Where am I?" "Were back at the pokemon center you fainted from exhaustion."

"Oh, I did strain myself pretty hard I guess I wanted to impress you, but instead just drained myself." "Awe, it's ok you didnt have to battle them both." "I know I wanted to though to prove myself worthy of your command." "You are my very special close Gardevoir." "Thank you Jaden." Blushing a scarlet hue. "I got to go take a shower." "Ok, see you in a little bit." So you lay back down and fall asleep on the bed. "Gardevoir... Dinner time." "Oh, ok." You both head downstairs for food.

You both sit down and eat as you quietly eat your pokemon food which you really had had nothing like before having eaten berries then chased by angry pokemon... you like being safe and close to Jaden. *I am so lucky to have Jaden in my life... I was so lonely and have never had any real friends as I was always on the move.* Jaden looks over to see you lost in thought. "Everything ok Gardevoir?" "Huh? Oh yeah everything is fine..." Blushing. "Well, eat up I don't want my pokemon to go hungry during battles." "Yes, Jaden."

You begin to eat again as you all finish you head upstairs and lay on the floor not sure as you has always slept on the ground. "What are you doing?" "Sleeping is something wrong?" "Yeah, why are you sleeping on the ground?" "I have always slept like this while on the move..." "Make's sense as you had no real place to stay..."

"Here come sleep with me..." You blush suddenly. "Um... you mean it?" "Yeah I dont want my pokemon to sleep on the floor." You get up and walk over and lay down by him saying "What is this it is comfy i have never experienced something like this?" "It's called a bed." "Interesting are they always here?" "Yeah they are." "Yeah can I sleep in it with you more often?" "Yeah, it is better than sleeping on the floor. We will camp out sometimes." "Camp out?"

"I'll explain that later. right now let's sleep." "Ok Jaden." You both lay down on the bed where you fall into a peaceful slumber with some dreams. *What is this feeling? It is around Jaden...* *It feels like a fuzzy feeling...* *What is this feeling? It is strange i have never experienced it before.* You feel a slight shaking... "Gardevoir wake up..." "Huh?" "Breakfast time."

"Oh, Ok then." *Yawn* You slowly rise from the bed with out feeling any pain as you have from sleeping on the cold hard ground. "I haven't slept that well in years." "Did you enjoy it?" "Yes very much so..." You walk up to Jaden and kiss his cheek. "Thank you for letting me sleep with you." You both blush at what you had done. "I feel fuzzy..." "Fuzzy how?" "I feel all fuzzy when ever I am around you... I think i have feeling for you..." Blushing again.
