after the battle ashley awoke to find herself in a bed in the leviathen city pokecenter.kurt then walks to ashley."good morning honey,and how is my beautiful wife doing today?"he says."oh im fine but i cou-wait WIFE!?!?!"she screams now suddenly alarmed.at this point kurt is now rolling on the floor laughing.ashley then got up off her bed and began to walk towards him but suddenly stopped once she saw his face.kurt was laughing at the joke he had pulled on ashley but suddenly stopped when ashley got off her bed and the blanket fell off her slender frame.kurt now began to blush madley.ashley was wondering what he was staring at,until she noticed his face was almost a vivid red,she then quickly looked down and discovered she was naked(she still has her fur though)and she realized kurt was staring at her!"S-S-STOP STARING AT ME!"she screams while covering her self.after ashley had gotten dressed she and kurt went downstairs and were informed about their destination."were going on a cruise?"ashley asks inocently."yeah isnt it wonderful!"may shrieks."i still dont understand how we could aford this."lucarrio says."actually it was free."brock replies.after what seems like hours they board the ship via the city docks.after they board they are rushed into the grand hall where the guest of the evening appears and tells everyone that the reason they are here is because he wants to see who has the strongest anthro pokemon.after the introduction is over everyone heads to their rooms and prepares for the next day,completly unaware of the danger under their feet. the next day.

Ashley woke up feeling full of energy,not having anything better to do ashley then prepared for the tournament.meanwhile in the dephes of the cruise liner `heavens paradise' a meeting was taking place."so how many anthros are on board?"one of the technitians asked."at least 329 anthros sir,and this came as an enexpected surprise but ashley is also here as well as ash and his pikachu."the second tech said."perfect,give her the most elegant 2 dresses you can find,then release project T.A.L.O.S. into the ship when it seems suitable and jam all communications to the outside."the first tech says."yes sir commander stone."back with ashley.

after ashley had finished training with lucarrio she returned to her room to find two dresses on her bed,both looked like something a princess would wear.but there was a note inbetween them.ashley picked up the note and read:dear ashley,i would like to see you in one of these two beautiful dresses,i have already seen you in your panties and bra,but i must confess i was embaressed to see you like that and would like to rectify that moment.as a token of my apoligy you can keep the two dresses,they were worn by an actual princess,the pink and white frilly one can be worn as casual clothing,the yellow and white one is a ball gown and would be more suited for the ocassion,on the table their is a pair of gloves,boots,panties,and bras to match both dresses.meet me at on the bow at 4:00p.m.,i look foward to seeing you.

ashley put the note down and blushed,someone had seen her in her panties and bra,not only that but someone had also gone through the trouble of getting her two dresses that were actualy worn by princesses.she then exaimened the two outfits,the pink and white frilly dress was beautiful and it went down to her knee's,it also had a heart outlined in white in the spot where it would cover her breasts,the gloves went to her elbos and were white just like the boots,the boots were intresting,they were high heeled boots that went to her knee's and were extremely comfortable to walk in,the panties and bra were a matching set and had a flower and heart with rainbows printed on them.the yellow dress however went down to her feet had gorgeous yellow heels had no gloves to go with it,the dress was extremely detailed and pretty,the panties and bra for this one were black with white poka dots,the bra however was strapless.ashley deeply impressed by both dresses stripped her clothes and slipped into the yellow dress and all of its accessories,then may came in and was uterly shocked."whoa ashley,where did you get the beautifull dress?"may asked.

Ashley then explained to may had happened so far."so thats whats making you dress fancy huh,well let me do your hair real quick."may said.ashley let may fix her hair and then left looking like a actual princess.she then found herself on the bow of the ship."agh there is the lovely ashley."a mysterious voice said."jeremy?"she said."yes,i am the one who left those dresses on your bed."jeremy says."but your the host of the battle royale and the host of this cruise."ashley asked."yes i am the host of this cruise and i was wondering if you would care to dance with me?"he says seductivly."s-sure,why n-not?"ashley replies.they slowley began to dance until someone grabbed ashley."mind if i cut in?"kurt says while holding ashleys hand."kurt what are you doing?"

she askes."you obviously wernt comfortable dancing with that pile of crap."he says."dont tell me your jealous that he got me two beautiful dresses and got me to dance with him."ashley says playfully."well-i-er-ugh-hey are you going to talk or dance,cau-"was all he was able to say before ashley leaned closer and kissed him.the kiss lasted 5 minutes.after that they both met up with the others and were about to attend the battle royale until the ship shook violently."what was that!?!"kurt and ashley both asked.suddenly a huge creature came through the wall,it was completly armored was carring a 4 barreled rocket launcher,a mini gun,and tentecals were coming out of every avaliable spot on its body,but on the side team tyrants insignia was visable."RUN!!!!!"jacobs shouted.and run they did,they ran until they were in the cargo hold surrounded by strange tubes and syringes.suddenly the creature backhanded ashley and threw a huge peice of the floor at her,ashley tried to evade it but it was too late,the metal slab cut into her right arm and pinned her into place.ashley passed out due to losing so much blood,the creature then proceded to attack the others launching missles and hosing them with bullets.

Ashley then awoke to see her friends and family geting beatin up by the strange creature,then she saw a syringe on the floor and with painful effort managed to get unstuck and began to crawl towards the syringe,ashley had torn off her right arm in the process of getting herself free from the giant slab of metal and had now finally reached the syringe,grasping it with her left arm she then injected herself with whatever was in the syringe and instantly her right arm grew back,but it was different,it was curvy had a spiral like pattern,the fingers on the end looked like spikes,electricity was being emitted all over her new arm.however her teal eyes turned red and black blood began to ooze out of her wounds.after the pain became managable she got up and stabbed the creature with her blade like hand.ashley then focused her eletricity into her finger tips and killed the strange creature,slowly the ship began to explode,and everyone was trying to make it to a escape pod,ashley looked at her friends and family and finaly decided to speak."i-i sorry,i h-had n-no c-ch-choice."she began."stop,save your energy."lucarrio said."but-"was all ashley could say before jacobs stepped in."STAND DOWN SOLDIER!YOU ARE TO SAVE YOUR STRENGTH,ESCAPE WITH US TO THE SURFACE AND GET YOUR SELF CURED,THATS AN ORDER.DO I MAKE MYSELF CLEAR?"he yelled.

"S-sir y-y-yes s-s-sir."ashley managed to reply.they began to run down corridors and occassionaly stopped to give ashley a breather but then just as quickly got back on the move,eventually they made it to a escape pod and were in the process of getting it open when ashley charged them.(i,i infected myself with some kind of virus,i know im not getting off this boat alive,but still they wont leave without me,but i can make them leave!)ashley thought to herself.and wih that she smacked them all into the pod,and just as quickly sealed it."ASHLEY!NO,DONT DO THIS!ASHLEY IT'S GOING TO BE ALRIGHT,WE CAN CURE YOU!" kurt

screamed.the others shouted at ashley to open the pod and let them help her,but ashley simply walked in pain to the manual ejection button and with her mutated arm broke the console and sent the pod hurling towards the surface,kurt saw ashley punch the console and felt the pod accelerate towards the surface,but he saw ashley smile right before she was replaced by the sight of tubing as the pod sped towards the surface.it wasent for another hour until the final pod hit the surface than kurt had for the one hunderedth time tried to swim down towards the wreck to save ashley,he gave up soon after three more attempts,he did find ashleys luggage,one of which had the pink dress and all the accessories that went with it,he then took them to ash,jacobs,and the others who the had a moment of silecnce for the ones who didnt make it.after they paid thier repects.

They put ashleys dress and accessories in ahes backpack and continued on thier journey,unaware of the fact that on a nearby beach a anthro eevee girl with a mutated arm surfaced alive but in extreme pain.kurt then began to think of what would have become of him and ashley,could they have dated?could they have been girlfriend and boyfriend?could they have gotten married?he would never get the awnsers because ashley was dead.ashley awoke in a half stange world,due to some fluke,some random toss of the galactic dice,she had mutated to the point where she was in so much pain that she could ignore it.ashley suddenly heard footsteps and knew that it wasent her friends or family.she then realized that it was team tyrant,she felt rage building up inside her and she decided to attack them.and that is what she did ,ashley rushed them and smashed one mans skull in an used her mutated arm to blow the other one into blood soaked peices when suddenly one of them got lucky and fired a tranqu-dart.

154221111.content:
As my 'glamorous' work place become finally visible behind the pokecenter, my walking peace slow down and my reminiscence about my past conclude itself. Lana relatively recent behavior made me question my reason for being a trainer, or a i-am-not-yet-ready-but-i-will-be-soon of sort, and force me to answer the same question every trainer at the beginning of his/her career ask themselves:

Are jeans fashionable in purple?

I am serious, they are the more resilient and at the same time, cheaper trainer outfit available on the market. I do not wonder why.

The second question is of course, am i ready for this?

Most trainer always think themselves ready, but frankly i question certain parents so called sense of responsibility, i mean, i am seventeen and thanks to my charm (someone owed me a favor, a big one), and skill (i literally opened a door that should have been locked by slipping on the wet floor and ended up seeing the only daughter of Trevor being speared by a quite big pokemon in an exit only unmentionable place, from behind by the way), i obtained a very respectable and more importantly, well payed line of work at the Trevor Labs.

And that was the day i changed my mind on guided tours and understood their significant importance

As i was saying..oh yeah, parents. They let their children at the age of 10 travel the land in company of the most powerful, sometimes dangerous, and most of the time horny creature of the whole planet. Alone beside his fluffy Vulpix. Without any (sexual) education at all, beside normal (basic) survival skills and education. What the actual fuck?!

And some of them are genuinely surprised when the son finally return home after Years of traveling and they caught him ruthlessly fuck his Ninetales so hard that would make a Kangaskhan jealous, of the vixen of course. My neighbor real story, serious, i still remember the mother screaming something about wee-wee and vagoo i rather forget that day.

Returning to the present i remind myself to ask Amanda (i can now call the above mentioned daughter by first name, and she don't mind, really) why we still use a revolving door, double one are far more stylish, my personal secretary greet me in the lobby and immediately begin to list all my duty for the day. Despite what one may think, justify my position to Amanda's father became a lot easier then she expected once i proven myself quite capable despite my age and inexperience. In fact Trevor was so impressed by my suggestions that he not only confirmed my position, he gave me even more responsibility.

I was the first one to remain surprised really, i would have never thought, not in a million years that scientist so smart, enough to mention most if not all the genetic code of certain pokemons by memory with all their significance and how it's possible to modify them (I will NEVER ask again to explain me or suggest how to improve by recombine the peptide..something nucle...ahhhhh forget it, given that their answer was, most of the time, "The subject would have died a painful, atrocious death". That's a big no-no in my book), are unable to think to use coffee pods instead of making it themselves with that Ancient machinery, is a mystery to me.

Of course that was probably the lowest but still one of the most practical, ideas i gave to this place.

As my secretary, who's name i don't bother to remember as small revenge for nagging me so much (despite that it's her work), finish her list we have finally reached the door of my morning salvation, my office door

As most morning i thank her and commend her efficiency, she is efficient after all despite my small resent toward her, and ask her to send me a note with all my appointments and duty of the day, as a reminder of course. She happily nod and finally scram from my small hallway.

I sigh in relief and open the door....only to find the very same person i wanted to talk with, Amanda, seated on my chair with a smile so big it's scary

She speak with a sweet, slightly alluring voice "How is my preferred employee feeling today?"

Once again it's not what it may seems to be, we are not together or something and she is mostly sincere with me, mostly because since that day...."I have a gift for youuuuu"

I don't like her tone, not a tiny little bit

She knell under my desk and retrieve a pokeball, then she open it and a Flareon appear near a small pile of stacked documents, today work i presume. The Flareon pant as if tired, her eyes are downcast but not with pain or tiredness, it's...stressed i think

She get up from my chair and invite me to come closer "This" she indicate the Flareon "Is XR37D2, or as i prefer it, Shany. She just completed a series of test in the labs and after the all clear i personally discharged her, for you"

At first i didn't like her tone, now i am scared shitless of it. That's because i already know what she is planning, in fact since that day...

"Amanda, look. I appreciate your attempt to make me pokephiliac but seriously, try to spend your time a little more constructively. Please"

Since the day i caught her taking it up the ass by her pet, and subsequently become a trusted employee, she tried relentlessly to make me fuck a pokemon. Any pokemon, doesn't matter type or size. Well, at least they was all female, she got that right at least after the first and last time she attempted pairing me with a male one.

She continue to smile and completely ignore my rebuttal "Shany here is, yes you guessed it right, in heat, a status greatly amplified by our newest serum XRT554, alias Neural Enhancer Serum" then she look at me as if i was a pimp "You dirty minded trainer, oh, and this is her first heat soooo, she is a virgin too" she end her phrase with even a bigger smile then before. Why? Why can't i find a decent person once, WHY?!

I shake my head and facepalm for great justice "Amanda..." i gesticulate as telling her, 'you are doing it wrong' "I suggested that serum after our scientists discovery of the side effects certain common used trainer potion have on pokemon, it is a Serious problem, i did not...." I indicate the Flareon "That, i solve problem Amanda, it's my work"

She look at me with nonchalance, a look that say 'Yeah right' "But of course, it's all work work work with you uh? So, did you finally screw that sweet, tight, green pussy i sent you yet?"

I calmly reply "No, i haven't fucked Lana-"

She interrupt me "Yet, i bet she is making it difficult for you uh? Presenting every morning, giving you a good, passionate view of her undertail.."

"...I won't send her back"

"The you'll end up fucking her silly, making both me and her very happy. Me, because finally you'll admit the truth and join our 'small' club, her because..oh i believe you can guess it yourself, hahaha"

i hastily try to end our conversation "Amanda please leave my office, i have work to do, the Trans-dimensional experiment is fluctuating again and our engineers can't still make head or tail of it"

Her smile disappear "Again? Oh damn them all to Darkrai pit. I'll go check it out, in the meantime" her smile return "Enjoy your bonus Mr i am not a pokephiliac Yet, later"

I sign at her to stop "Hey hey hey wait, return her-"

"No can do, she is cleared and i have already registered her to you. And of course, as the contract dictate, 'You cannot reveal company assets to the public without our explicit consent', so or with you, or the lab where she will be bred mercilessly by our very best studs, for science of course"

....Right

She open the door, but just before exiting she seductively conclude "Oh, she should go in heat very second week of the month, have fun!"

My eyes widen "Wait!-"

The door slam closed, leaving me alone with a Very horny pokemon, and my arousal still not fully passed after Lana show this morning

The Flareon look sniff at me interestingly

Flare..flaaaare"


".........Ffffffuck"
154221111.title: My work, my crux

choices: Net Tech Division, want to see progress on portal device
1542211111.content:
Deciding that discretion is the better part of valor, i simply walk towards my office door and let myself out, then remind myself that this is not cowardice, i am not fleeing from a pokemon, it's merely a tactical retreat against a fight i know i cannot win in the long run

I sigh as i lock the door with my electronic key, because despite my obvious reluctance i know myself well enough to understand that my instinct and libido can only take so much before i decide to not give a fuck anymore and...do that

My secretary come to my office just as i am about to go to the chemical labs, and of course see me as i lock the door and sigh, hopefully she know nothing of what's in my office and she is not Amanda accomplice in her plan on making me pokephiliac, in all her attempts i never saw any proof of it but "better safe then sorry" policy is the best one here i think

"Sir? Why are you-"

From her reaction she doesn't seems to be involved, but i still don't trust the appearances "I decided to check the progress on our new line of behavior suppressant, the information given to my office are sketchy as best, absolutely unacceptable"

Her face show surprise for a moment before returning perfectly professional "But sir, i personally verified-"

With a tone of finality "I want to see it for myself miss..."

"Katia, but the labs-"

"Now, Katia"

She calm herself down "Very well sir, this way"

Realistically my aggressiveness wasn't necessary, and i have security clearance to the labs and most other facility but, i needed something to vent upon, i know i am an asshole sometimes, i will find something to make it up for her, like a week refresher course in some tropical island maybe, with all the work and the stress i sometimes i am forced to put her through she earn it

Also i haven't even have the time to check the reports anyway, wanted to but Amanda Flareon, damn her and her weirds ideas, if she wasn't the daughter of the president of this company...bah

Our walk to the chemical labs is short and uneventful, dreadfully silent too, but i certainly don't blame her, she probably spent a few hours giving me a full report of the labs and then i simply tell her that the information are sketchy, she must hate me or worse feel inadequate. Maybe the course can happen in a resort close to the beach or something, to show her my appreciation of her abilities without things getting awkward between us

I don't want a relationship with her, only make her feel appreciated for all her hard work, even if i detest her for all the work she daily put in my plate, irrational i know, but since when emotions act rationally?

I return to pay attention to my surroundings when the sealed double door of the labs finally open, the guards politely nodding as they let me and my secretary inside one of the biggest research facility on this continent

Obviously the head of this division come and greet us warmly "Welcome to the chemical division Head Executor, how can i be of help?"

Man how much i hate that title, seriously what kind of name is that? Well at least my authority allow me to meddle in nearly everything this company is doing, and it show the president confidence in my skills, hopefully he is not thinking his daughter and i....by the way sometimes i have been called vice-president-

The head scientist wake me up from my reverie "Sir?"

Damn it focus! "I would like to examine the progress of the new experimental inhibitors, along with the live test of possible"

His smile return "But of course sir, this way"

My secretary follow in silence while the head scientist explain to me the results of their research, obviously he is trying to impress me, but right now i don't care, i only want to know if the inhibitor work

As we approach a corridor with various viewing windows to some live test subjects he explain "Our preliminary result are encouraging, but unfortunately we haven't yet found the correct mix to affect all kind of pokemon without causing side effects, the subjects here are a good example of this"

He reach the first window "In this room we have put three Male Umbreon injected with the experimental inhibitor, we will now introduce a Female Ninetails in heat to verify if this mix affect Dark Type pokemon effectively"

The room with the test subject is very simple, a 10x10 room with grass as floor and a few trees here and there, a realistic artificial light that emulate the sun and a ventilation system to keep the ambient clean and fresh, a few vieving screens just under the window connected to various cameras in the room are also present

An hidden door open as a Ninetails with the tails down to cover her genitals is pushed in, the door seal behind her and of course the until now perfectly calm Umbreons immediately go to check out the new arrival

It doesn't take more then a few moments for the males to smell the Ninetails heat and approach her more decisively. Differently from how normally it would happen they do not fight among themselves for mating rights, instead all three approach the female and try to coax her to lay down with small pushes and a few licks

She refuses any kind of sexual approach however and the three males calmly charge their attacks with unnatural calm and precision, rapidly and efficiently defeating the Ninetails and force her to lay on her belly. Despite her reluctance one of the Umbreon easily shift her tails aside and mount her as the other two keep the female from retaliating with Psychic, holding her down


One of the camera clearly show the Umbreon cock sliding inside the Ninetails dripping pussy, as the female try uselessly to free herself from the males grip. The one breeding her evidently enjoy her willing body but still keep an unnatural slow peace for the species instead of mating her roughly like Dark Type usually do, is this the promising result? I expected better

The male eventually knot the Ninetails and release inside her, only now she stop struggling. Curiously the Male behind her remove his knot from her and allow another male to have his way with a now willing Ninetails, i suppose she know it's too late to avoid pregnancy and just decide to let her instinct go, enjoying her time as best she can

I have always found this part of pokemon rationality more then a little disturbing to say the least

The head scientist explain "As you may see, the inhibitor fail to prevent the Umbreon breeding the subject but, it calmed them down and avoided uselessly infighting between them, so far this is the best result we obtained with most types"

I nod, regretting to have come here "On what type of pokemon the inhibitor as proved to be most effective?"

He lead us to more viewing screens "So far only Steel, Fighting and Normal type effectiveness prevented the breeding altogether, significant aggressiveness reduction on all others, included dual types"

My secretary ask the next question "And the enhancer? The National Breeding Association is getting impatient about-"

He quickly reply "We fixed the so called problem i assure you, if you want to follow I'll demonstrate"

So, the Behavior Inhibitor meant for civilian application is still ineffective, while and amplifier for the pokemon already more then enough developed instinct to breed is ready? How ironic given my situation, but the part that bother me more about this is..

"It was a stroke of genius if i may say it sir, your Neural Enhancer Serum is proving to be the base for many other possible applications, including this one"

In my head i imagine me grabbing this cheap fake adulator with his far too long tongue and bashing his cranium on the first hard spiked surface i found, in reality i can't do that however, a thing i found somewhat sad given the situation i am in

So i decide to do the second best thing that came to mind and ignore his comment completely "When the Inhibitor will be ready for practical application?"

He think on it for a few moments while we walk "At least another three months for field testing i believe, then another six at least to extensively test it's effectives on all pokemon types and work out the right dosage to be universally compatible"

Fuck, i need an alternative solution

As i think about other possible options the head scientist show us another viewing window, inside this room practically identical to the other various pair of pokemon are having an orgy of sort

In this room female like a Salamence or a Garchomp are laying on their back and allow pokemon they normally consider little more then food or part of the environment to breed them

It's note worthy to notice how the Salamence is getting pounded by an Arbok while the Garchomp let a Treecko fucking her silly, and given the quantity of liquid on the ground id say they are in that position for a while now

I turn away from the spectacle and ask "It's ready then?"

He proudly answer "Yes sir, by the end of the week it's all yours to commercialize"

I am so fucking happy with that
1542211111.title: A solution is not so easily found

15422111111.content:
Getting out the chemical division was the best idea I had today, especially after the spectacle and the news, unfortunately the inhibitor development is proceeding too slowly for me to benefit, or other people like a....well in similar condition.

My secretary Katia, finally I remember her name, remind me of the visit I had planned last week at the tech division, a visit I had to skip after the esteemed daughter of our president suddenly decided to 'renovate' the Pokémon cages, allowing to mix male and female of incompatible breed to 'mingle' with each other, to improve morale she said.

Well, the Seviper definitely enjoyed the Meganium Company at least, until an ignorant idiot opened the Zangoose cages. How strange that two different Pokémon that hate each other so much are capable to interbreed so easily, I am sure the Zangoose in heat I saw entering the labs would have agreed with my argument, if she could have talked with every office filled that is.

Never fired someone so quickly before, nor we ever used so many sedative gas at once, worked though. Well mostly, nearly all our Zangoose female are pregnant now, some Seviper too, but at least I get to satisfy my curiosity, always wanted to know what would have come out between the two.

During my not so happy reminiscence Katia once again take the lead and efficiently bring me through twisted corridors and security measure towards the Tech Division, the very beating hearth of the company and source of most our income, our improved poke watch completely replaced the old version manufactured by the Pokétch company, forcing them out of market.

The extra security measure where put in place after most higher up of our company, me included, received threatening letters from the old Pokétch president, he died of natural cause a few months after, but his daughter never believed the doctors and accused us publicly of being responsible for his demise. She vanished immediately after, cursing our names.

After her disappearance I personally looked her father medical records, thanks to a favor the clinic owned me, to see if her accusation where at least partially founded, only to find that the man suffered from a rare genetic disease that was ultimately responsible for his premature death. Apparently he had given instruction to not mention his medical problem to his daughter, and to screen his spawn for similar diseases, but her medical records seems to has been stolen from the archives and the doctor didn't knew the test results, leaving me empty handed.

Once again is the head Scientist greetings that recall me back to the present, his voice strangely meek for such a big man "Welcome Head Executor, I trust that no more chemical accidents have worsened your day?"

Wrong grammar, or maybe it's just laziness, no matter what chemical and tech division I never saw eye to eye so to speak, both always compete to be the 1st more productive division, and the chemical even won a few times I has been told, but with the so called 'cage accident' I don't think this year’s chemical has any chance of winning.

Neither is getting the extra money given in appreciation for the hard work to the head scientists. I always protested against this methods, at least give a lower sum but to the whole division, why the rest of them should care if their boss get even more money, they are paid more than enough already. Still haven't managed to get my way yet, but I will, oh if I will.

"Nothing particularly interesting I am afraid"

A sadistic grim appear on his face "Not surprising Sir, they barely keep up to our company standards"

I decide to ignore his remark "Perhaps, but I have heard that the portal device is having similar problems during the last test, and that it nearly blow up along with the whole laboratory"

His smirk disappears, replaced by a nervous smile "N-no Sir! It was merely a small drawback due to-"

I lift my hand and sign him to stop "I don't want to hear excuses, I want results"

He is an asshole and deserve this tone and more "How long for the next experiment?"

He recomposes himself "Two days Sir, do you wish to-"

"Yes, depending on schedule the president may also be present, understood?"

His face pale visibly "Yes Sir!"

"Good, now I would like to visit the labs if possible"

Some sense of pride return in his voice, a confidence he lacked a few seconds ago "Absolutely sir, this way please."
15422111111.title: Tech division and the past

154221111111.content:
As the head of the tech division ungracefully escort us to the central lab, i said ungracefully because now the the 'higher up', namely me, are here, he decide that if i see him shouting and generally being an asshole to his charges to push the to work harder could be a good show of his management skill to me

Needless to say i do not approve of this methods, not only screaming and shouting at your employee do not prove anything, beside that you are incapable of talking normally apparently, but it also merely show how incapable of managing the people under him he his, if fact only a frustrated or otherwise incapable person unable to fulfill his duties, will 'unload' all his frustration and sense of inferiority on others

This basic principle is of course prevented in case an idiot, cause thousand of credits in damage because he is too stupid to read the instruction manual. I know that we males usually avoid even touching the thing on purpose, some sort or pride instinctual mechanism i am sure, but when someone entrust you with a device capable of launching 'electrical stun darts' with a capacity of little more then 10.000 volts each as a defensive measure, at least have the common sense to NOT shoot to an electrical panel controlling the automatic cages where the so called dangerous pokemon are kept

Repeatedly

Security had to run in double turns to keep up with the mess, but at least no one was harmed


After our my unneeded escort finally stop shouting to his charges, probably believing to has already showed his oh so capable managing skill already, and reminding me why i was asking Amanda's father if i could fire this buffoon, to my grimace not yet, only for him to smile creepily as insinuating that i will be able to once i .... do something with her daughter....anyway

The door of the central lab finally open as the head scientist press his fingerprint on a wall pad, and the retinal scanner confirm his identity. A female robotic voice confirm our authorization to enter, then the ten seconds procedure necessary to unseal the door begin...at least the idea of forced teleporting as only way to access the lab was previously discarded, the very idea of being disassembled and then reassembled in billion pieces still give me the chill safe procedure as it may be, no matter what our 'esteemed' head scientist said

When the door finally unseal, a gentle but constant breeze caress all our form, this is normal, in fact as a precaution the pressure inside the actual lab is higher then the rest of the complex, this will naturally 'push' away the air from inside the lab and prevent possible intrusion of unwanted particles in the construction area, will also make easier to detect possible breaches in the integrity of the internal structure

Another small corridor greet us in it's milky white cleanliness, the environment of this lab it's so excessively controlled that even our shoes leave no mark whatsoever on the floor, no matter what kind of filth may be on them. Not sure how they did it, but it's kinda creepy in my opinion

Our guide nervously guide me and my secretary to the upper viewing room, where a small meeting room with holographic projectors and all the portal schematic are kept, i would have preferred see the portal up close, but given the security measures necessary to keep all the inner mechanism perfectly free of any possible contaminant such option is not yet available to me, or at least until the external structure mean to seal the more sensitive part of the portal device are built, this thing is treated as even the smallest speck of dust could spell the doom of the whole project, which for what i was able to gather is definitely not true

Nonetheless there are various electronic components that are sensitive to electrostatic charges and whatnot, so i understand the necessary restrictions

The small set of stairs that lead us to the upper room are, thankfully, not white, managing to make me feel a little more relaxed. Realistically i don't personally consider steel gray a color that go particularly well with white, but given how sterile and unnaturally clean the room look, even beige would have done the trick

I was just thinking how better then usually i felt in company of our guide, probably because he kept his mouth shut instead of constantly itemize all his division success as he usually do in the presence of any of the 'higher up', of course i say was because the first thing i notice in the normally serious looking room, is Amanda seated at the head of the table, once again with the same smile i found her about an hour ago in my office, and for some reason the table is covered with an additional bluish tablecloth that cover even the sides of the table, hiding the legs and feet from view

Damn it, i forgot that she came here to supervise the project after the last stability problems. As a reaction the first thing i do after seeing her in the room, is immediately saying "Seeing that Amanda is already here, i see no reason to-"

But of course, Amanda interrupt me "Do not worry Head Executor, a second competent opinion is always welcome, and beside, you are already here, no reason to not look up the lastest project development"

Competent? I know little about quantum physics or the whadda-jadda most of the scientist are talking about here, but if she is referring to the only person with enough common sense to veto a project meant to distort time and space to a point it tear a breach in our reality, then yes i am without a doubt, the only expert they have in the field

I am more then a little tempted to just turn away and leave, but the next phrase pretty much seal my fate "Come in, come in Head Executor, have a seat"

I silently sigh, the head of the tech division is already preparing, even if fighting against would be more fitting, the presentation with all the progress on the project, so, steeling myself as best i can, i calmly sit on the opposite side of Amanda as my secretary take a seat next to mine

I rapidly scan my memory as i wait for the presentation to start, trying to remember everything about the project that could be considered important from my professional point of view, when Amanda unexpectedly call my secretary by name, curious, never heard her call any but her most close collaborators by name in public, then after a quick confabulation, Katia leave the room without another word

As soon as my secretary exit the room, the door lock with an electronic bip, it's a standard security measure in this part of the labs, one i regard as excessive, but i can understand given the circumstances, but why Amanda wanted Katia out?

The head scientist clear his throat, signaling us his readiness for the presentation, it's Amanda that give him the cue "Proceed professor, we will keep the questions for later"

His smile unnaturally wide, he proceed to begin the presentation that i am sure he stolen from one of his subordinate, pressing the button on the holographic projectors controls as the lights intensity lower automatically from bright white to a soft yellow. As expected he begin by emphasizing his name as main responsible for the project, having placed his name practically under every holo-slide, usually not in small characters either

When the real presentation finally begin nearly two minutes later, my senses begin to pick up some strange sounds, similar to when a pokeball get opened, but much, much quieter, a sound so small i barely heard it at all

Not even the time to relax and finish thinking how now i am even imagining things, that i feel something suddenly grabbing my pants and tear them open..
